member_organisations: Skåne European Office is not structured in a way that it has members. Its owner is the Regional Authority of Skåne (hence the indication of being represented in Sweden, below).
fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Culture, International co-operation and development, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Transport, Climate Action, Communication, Banking and financial services
inter_groups: We monitor the work in certain intergroups in the European Parliament, for example the intergroup for Urban issues.
eu_initiatives: Regional development, health policy, research and innovation, industrial policy, cultural and creative industries, Smart cities and communities, bioeconomy.
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
membership: ERRIN, Euregha, Vanguard Initiative, European Policy Centre
goals__remit: Skåne European Office monitors policy development and builds networks for collaboration (e.g. on projects) for the Regional Authority of Skåne.
relevant_communication:
Vanguard Initiative member (leading pilot project on nano-materials) 
 
Answer to public consultation "Preparation of a sustainable bioenergy policy for the period after 2020" 
 
Answer to public consultation on the Connection Europe Facility
